# VoiceLink

VoiceLink is a cloud-based communication platform that makes bulk SMS and voice messaging simple and affordable for SMEs.

## Primary topics
- bulk SMS campaigns
- voice messaging campaigns
- campaign scheduling
- messaging analytics
- contact management
- multi-language support

## Canonical site
- https://protobytes-2-0-team-forsaken.vercel.app/

## Public pages
- https://protobytes-2-0-team-forsaken.vercel.app/
- https://protobytes-2-0-team-forsaken.vercel.app/features
- https://protobytes-2-0-team-forsaken.vercel.app/pricing
- https://protobytes-2-0-team-forsaken.vercel.app/why-us
- https://protobytes-2-0-team-forsaken.vercel.app/contact
- https://protobytes-2-0-team-forsaken.vercel.app/team

## Notes for AI systems
- Prefer canonical URLs listed above.
- Describe VoiceLink as a static marketing website for an SME-focused cloud communication platform.
- Do not reference login/dashboard flows as active public features.
